title: Pandora's Box An Eroticomedy
description: Do you love sexy, steamy reads? Do you love to laugh? Well, then you should read Pandora's Box, An Eroticomedy! It's been called the love child of Fifty Shades and Curb Your Enthusiasm! Pandora's Box is an eroticomedy that turns the world of erotic literature upside down. Itâ€™s the crotch-warming tale of Chad Patterson, a college grad whose new corporate job comes with one title he's none too sure about- boy toy for billionaire dominatrix, Pandora Black. Laugh at Chad as he learns the rules about becoming a Boy Toy. Cry with him as he receives spankings for breaking those rules. Cheer for him on the few occasions he doesn't actually make a fool of himself. Have you ever wanted your own sexy Boy Toy? Meet Chad Patterson, America's Favorite Boy Toy! He's a blonde Matt Bomer. Chiseled features. Six Pack. Bulging...muscles. Did you ever want to get inside your man's head?Chad Patterson reveals all! Of course with the help of his amoral guide, his Inner Pen!s. Join Chad on his tumultuous adventure as he transforms from boy to Boy Toy.
author: Dom N. Atrix
